title: Spa Foods - Golden Place Rama 9
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Thai, Juice bar
description: Part of Spa Foods vegetarian restaurants in Bangkok. Restaurant is rather hidden behind Golden Place. Decorated in a 1970's atmosphere. Offers a unique selection of mockmeats made from textured soy protein. Prices moderate to expensive. Please confirm map marker location and let HappyCow know.
